item.description: We're building on the huge success of our first setback that was held in November at Lucky Lou's in Wethersfield! It will be held on JAN 7 2012. Lucky Lou's was very well received, judging from all the positive feedback, but we also like variety! So, your organizer, Chuck, is having this great meetup at Wood N Tap.... A good time will be had (again!) by all!....Ed and I just checked out the PRIVATE ROOM which seats 32 comfortably.......let the cards begin......you also be able to order off the menu and seperate checks available.......

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: SETBACK : THE SEQUEL ....SATURDAY JAN 7 2012 7 PM
